title: Margaret Thompson
maintext:
Margaret A. “Peggy” Thompson, 72, of Sun City West, Ariz., and formerly of Kankakee, passed away Monday (April 2, 2018) in Sun City West, Ariz.
She was born June 13, 1945, in Topeka, Kan., the daughter of Don and Margaret Roach Hartquist. Her husband, Bob Thompson, preceded her in death on May 16, 2003.
Peggy had worked at the Kankakee Water Company and also had been a volunteer for Catholic Charities. She enjoyed reading.
Surviving are one sister and two brothers-in-law, Laurie and Terry Cailteux, of McKinney, Texas, and Dominic Macaluso, of Bourbonnais; and many nieces and nephews.
In addition to her husband, she was preceded in death by her parents; and one sister, Diane (Hartquist) Macaluso.
Cremation rites have been accorded.
Inurnment will be at a later date in Abraham Lincoln National Cemetery in Elwood.
Please sign her online guestbook at clancygernon.com.
(Pd)
